entry.data:
MOSTLY CLOUDY THIS MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
A CHANCE OF THUNDERSTORMS, MAINLY THIS MORNING
SOME THUNDERSTORMS MAY PRODUCE DAMAGING WINDS, LARGE HAIL, AND TORNADOES THIS MORNING
BREEZY WITH HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
TEMPERATURE FALLING INTO THE LOWER 60S THIS AFTERNOON
SOUTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH, BECOMING WEST 15 TO 25 MPH THIS AFTERNOON
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
MUCH COOLER WITH LOWS AROUND 40
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 30 MPH

MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS IN THE MORNING, THEN SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE AFTERNOON
BREEZY AND MUCH COOLER WITH HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS 15 TO 25 MPH WITH GUSTS UP TO 40 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY
SHOWERS LIKELY IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH
GUSTS UP TO 35 MPH IN THE EVENING
CHANCE OF RAIN 70 PERCENT

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 15 TO 20 MPH

PARTLY CLOUDY
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
HIGHS IN THE MID 50S

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE LOWER 30S
HIGHS AROUND 60

PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

MOSTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
